snippet: The support from Emily’s List underscores efforts by Christine C. Quinn’s campaign to highlight her gender in a crowded Democratic primary field.
abstract: New York City Council Speaker Christine Quinn will pick up an endorsement in her quest to be mayor from Emily's List, influential national political action committee that backs Democratic women; support underscores efforts by Quinn's campaign to highlight her gender in crowded Democratic primary field.
lead_paragraph: The support from Emily’s List underscores efforts by Christine C. Quinn’s campaign to highlight her gender in a crowded Democratic primary field.

headline.seo: Christine C. Quinn, Council Speaker, to Be Endorsed by Emily’s List
headline.main: Influential Women’s ‘PAC’ to Back Council Speaker in Her Bid for Mayor
headline.print_headline: Influential Women’s ‘PAC’ to Back Council Speaker in Her Bid for Mayor
